input.sentences: the historic site taught us much about life many decades ago .
a country store that sold basic items was on site .
output.sentences: I was taught on site how to live a calm life.
This island had quaint and modest homes.
All the wooden furniture was hand crafted.
The cloth was all spun by hand to create the amazing fabrics.
The store was the only place the goods were sold, not online but only on site.
